randomArticles.articleAbstractText: Quadro P4000 显卡在 CentOS7 安装 官网下载对应 RedHat 驱动： https://www.dell.com/support/home/cn/zh/cnbsd1/product-support/servicetag/2xhzrt2/drivers 执行： [root@localhost ~]# sh NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-396.37.run 出现如下报错：  ERROR: The Nouveau kernel driver is currently in use by your system. This driver is incompatible with the NVIDIA driver, and must be disabled before proceeding. Please consult the NVIDIA driver README and your Linux distribution's documentation for details on how to correctly disable the Nouveau ....
